version_description: Bug Fix.
Bug Fix.
bugfix
bugfix
bugfix
bugfix
bugfix
bugfix

1, IOS client support sharing screen
2, Users can join the directly conference by scanning the code
3. When creating a conference, you can choose whether to hold a conference using a fixed personal conference ID.
4. The cloud conference administrator can select a dedicated cloud conference room when creating or scheduling a conference on the client.
5. External contacts of the enterprise can quickly join the meeting through received emails and text messages.
6. enterprise address book can display by department

1, IOS client support sharing screen
2, Users can join the directly conference by scanning the code
3. When creating a conference, you can choose whether to hold a conference using a fixed personal conference ID.
4. The cloud conference administrator can select a dedicated cloud conference room when creating or scheduling a conference on the client.
5. External contacts of the enterprise can quickly join the meeting through received emails and text messages.
6. enterprise address book can display by department
bugfix
bugfix

1. When sharing desktop/program in the unstable network scenarios such as airport/hotel, the picture delay is reduced, the definition is improved, and the mouse moves smoothly.
2. Reducing Background Noise Points in Video Pictures.
3. Added whether to allow guests to remove mute settings by themselves. After setting, guests will not be able to remove mute by themselves.
4. Increase the speed of mobile client landing/convening/joining meetings.

1. When sharing desktop/program in the unstable network scenarios such as airport/hotel, the picture delay is reduced, the definition is improved, and the mouse moves smoothly.
2. Reducing Background Noise Points in Video Pictures.
3. Added whether to allow guests to remove mute settings by themselves. After setting, guests will not be able to remove mute by themselves.
4. Increase the speed of mobile client landing/convening/joining meetings.

1. When sharing desktop/program in the unstable network scenarios such as airport/hotel, the picture delay is reduced, the definition is improved, and the mouse moves smoothly.
2. Reducing Background Noise Points in Video Pictures.
3. Added whether to allow guests to remove mute settings by themselves. After setting, guests will not be able to remove mute by themselves.
4. Increase the speed of mobile client landing/convening/joining meetings.
Optimize the participation in the meeting experience, you can follow the department batch invitation
Optimize the participation in the meeting experience, you can follow the department batch invitation
Optimize the participation in the meeting experience, you can follow the department batch invitation

1. The hand-raising function is added. Muted participants can raise hands if they want to speak.
2. The squealing sound detection function of the mobile client is optimized. When a squealing sound is detected, the participant who makes the sound is automatically muted.
3. The messaging function is optimized.

2. The squealing sound detection function of the mobile client is optimized. When a squealing sound is detected, the participant who makes the sound is automatically muted.
3. The messaging function is optimized.

3. The messaging function is optimized.

1、应用名称升级为【华为云会议】
2、支持美颜
3、会议发言，麦克风图标将随音量动态变化
4、消息功能下线，联系人Tab页下线
5、增加网络检测功能，协助用户主动解决网络异常
6、关闭摄像头视频画面显示用户头像
7、支持锁定会议，锁定共享
8、创会和预约会议增加设置入会范围（所有人，企业内人员，受邀人员）
9、分享会议优化，支持来宾分享会议

1、支持会议中成员文字聊天
2、客户端会议中布局优化
3、配套华为企业智慧屏IdeaHub支持投屏、扫码入会
4、匿名用户首次入会需要通过手机号码验证
5、预约会议支持日历通知

1、支持同声传译，与会者可选收听语言频道
2、与会者列表优化，支持搜索
3、修复会议录制无法在会中开启，新增会前自动开启录制
4、支持会议中小画面移动，以及两方会议时候支持大画面观看自己
5、匿名入会界面优化
6、修复观看ideahub会议宝标注时，无法显示笔锋标注和背景问题
7、海外用户关闭匿名入会短信验证
